title: Coronavirus: Is President Trump right to criticise the WHO?
description: The World Health Organization "failed in its basic duty" over coronavirus, Donald Trump claims.
content:
Image copyrightAFP/GettyImage caption
 The WHO has praised China for its handling of the outbreak
US President Donald Trump has accused the World Health Organization (WHO) of mismanaging and covering up the spread of the coronavirus after it emerged in Chin… [+5038 chars]
